section.names: gd0106:\ attempted\ to\ export\ explicit\ interface\ property\ implementation
section.title: GD0106: Attempted to export explicit interface property implementation

paragraph.strong: 修复是中断修复还是非中断修复

section.title: 原因
section.paragraph: An explicit interface property implementation is annotated with the [Export] attribute. Properties that implement an interface explicitly can't be exported.

section.title: 规则说明
section.paragraph: Godot doesn't allow exporting explicit interface property implementations. When an interface member is implemented explicitly, the member is hidden and consumers can't access them unless the type is converted to the interface first. Explicitly implemented members can also share the same name of other members in the type, so it could create naming conflicts with other exported members.

section.names: how\ to\ fix\ violations 如何解决冲突
section.title: 如何解决冲突
section.paragraph: To fix a violation of this rule, implement the interface implicitly or remove the [Export] attribute.

section.names: when\ to\ suppress\ warnings 何时禁止显示警告
section.title: 何时禁止显示警告
section.paragraph: Do not suppress a warning from this rule. Explicit interface property implementations can't be exported so they will be ignored by Godot, resulting in runtime errors.
